n=int(input())
a=sorted(int(input()) for _ in range(n))
print(sum(a[i]*a[-i-1] for i in range(n))%10007)

n = int(input())
A = [0] * n
for i in range(n):
    per = int(input())
    A[i] = per
A.sort()
answer = 0
for i in range(n):
    answer  = (answer + A[i] * A[n - i - 1]) % 10007
print(answer)

n = int(input())
ai = []
num = 0
for i in range(n):
    ai += [int(input())]
ai.sort()
for i in range(n//2):
    num += ai[n-i-1] * ai[i] * 2
if n % 2:
    num += ai[n//2] ** 2
print(num % 10007)

n = int(input())
a =[]
b =[]
for i in range(n):
	a.append(int(input()))
	b.append(a[len(a)-1])
a.sort()
b.sort()
b.reverse()
sum = 0
for i in range(n):
	sum+=(a[i]*b[i])
	sum%=10007
print(sum)

n = int(input())
a = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
a.sort()
print(sum(map(lambda x,y: x*y, a, reversed(a))) % 10007)

n=int(input())
list=[]
summ=int(0)
for i in range(n):
    a=int(input())
    list.append(a)
rev=list[::]
list.sort()
rev.sort(reverse=True)
for x in range(n):
    summ=(summ+((list[x]*rev[x])%10007)%10007)%10007
print(summ)

n = int(input())
a = sorted([int(input()) for i in range(n)])

time = 0
for i in range(n):
    time += a[i] * a[n - 1 - i]
    
print(time % 10007)

n = int(input())
C = []
A = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
A.sort()
B = A
for x in range(n):
    C.append(A[x]*B[n-x-1])
a = sum(C)
print(a%10007)

n = int(input())
dt = sorted([int(input()) for i in range(n)])

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
	ans += dt[i] * dt[-i-1]
print(ans%10007)

#!/usr/bin/env	python
#-*-coding:utf-8 -*-
n=int(input())
A=sorted(int(input())for _ in range(n))
B=10007
s=0
for i in range(n):s=(A[i]*A[-1-i]+s)%B
print(s)

n = int(input())

num = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
num.sort()

begin = 0
end = n-1
ans = 0

while begin<=end:
    if begin == end:
        ans += (num[begin]*num[end])
        ans %= 10007
    else:
        ans += 2*num[begin]*num[end]
        ans %= 10007
    begin+=1
    end-=1
        
print(ans)

n = int(input())
num = sorted([int(input()) for _ in range(n)])
print(sum([x*y for x,y in zip(num, reversed(num))])%10007)

final=0
n= int(input())
list1=[]

for i in range(n):
    list1.append(int(input()))
list1.sort()
for i in range(n):
    final += list1[i] * list1[n-i-1]
print(final%10007)

n=int(input())
a=sorted(int(input()) for _ in range(n))
print(sum(a[i]*a[-i-1] for i in range(n))%10007)

n = int(input())
a=[]
for i in range(n):
    a += [int(input())]
a.sort()
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    ans += a[i] * a[n-i-1]
print(ans % 10007)

laziness = []
for i in range(int(input())):
    laziness.append(int(input()))

laziness.sort()
j = len(laziness) - 1
sum = 0
for numb in laziness:
    sum += numb * laziness[j]
    j -= 1

print(sum % 10007)

num= int(input())
work=[]
for i in range(num):
    work.append(int(input()))
laziness= work.copy()
time= 0

laziness.sort()
work.sort()
work=work[::-1]

for i in range(len(work)):
    time += work[i] * laziness[i]

print(time % (10007))
